comments.comments_text: Paris SG will have a chance to score from a corner kick.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] will have a chance to score from a corner kick.

comments.comments_text: Hiroki Sakai (Marseille) is booked after bringing down an opponent. Jerome Brisard had an easy-decision to make.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is booked after bringing down an opponent. [REFEREE] had an easy-decision to make.

comments.comments_text: The referee points to the corner flag and Paris SG will take a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee points to the corner flag and [TEAM] will take a corner.

comments.comments_text: Neymar (Paris SG) sees a yellow! His tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably talked himself into Jerome Brisard's book.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sees a yellow! His tackle wasn't that harsh, but he probably talked himself into [REFEREE]'s book.

comments.comments_text: Dimitri Payet (Marseille) attempts to discuss the decision with Jerome Brisard, but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) attempts to discuss the decision with [REFEREE], but he soon realises that it's not the right thing to do as he sees the yellow.

comments.comments_text: Alessandro Florenzi (Paris SG) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) shouldn't be surprised it's a yellow from the ref, who cooled the situation down well.

comments.comments_text: Paris SG failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: Dimitri Payet floats a lovely ball in from the free kick. Florian Thauvin (Marseille) gathers the ball and strikes it into the bottom right corner, increasing the score to 0:1.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] floats a lovely ball in from the free kick. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) gathers the ball and strikes it into the bottom right corner, increasing the score to 0:1.

comments.comments_text: Pape Gueye (Marseille) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jerome Brisard didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket.

comments.comments_text: It's time for a substitution. That's the last involvement from Pape Gueye as he is replaced by Dario Benedetto (Marseille).
